TopicTitle: kerbal cant see my save files

Articles.Content: so jeb died and i returned to space center and forgot to revet so i edit the save file with notepad to get him bk then kerbal cant see any save file olny way i can play atm is make new game and moveing my quick save to its folder and loading it up in game but i gotta keep doing this over and over any way of fixing this ?? ive tryed uninstalling it deleteing all local file then installing and moveing save over and kerbal still cant see it

You simply bricked your savegame.

I think you edited the kerbal states?

No backup?

Start new game, try to repeat the steps and paste the various jeb-parts to old/bricked savegame.
